name: Trace Attorney
description:
Play as Justy, a barely graduated lawyer, as they try and figure out why their friend Gil has been arrested.
Credits:

Narrative Writing: Anooj Vadodkar

Copywriting: Rahul Sharma

Additional Writing: Meghna Anil "MegnaCarta"

Character Art: Meghna Anil "MegnaCarta"

Music: Faraz Ardalan "mrbutternice"

Concept: Anooj Vadodkar, Meghna Anil "MegnaCarta", Rahul Sharma, Faraz Ardalan "mrbutternice"
